text: @elonmusk @Tesla Dear @elonmusk , the battle to defeat #coronavirus is a global fight, therefore I'll urge & thank you in advance to put my country @NigeriaGov into consideration. The govt is effortlessly trying but the measures put in place is hard on d citizens. We want this to end in no time.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
